title: Manage a Track Maintenance Window
description: A maintenance crew needs a section of track to be taken out of service for 4 hours to perform repairs.

tasks.description: A maintenance foreman requests a maintenance window for a specific track segment and time period.
tasks.expected_outcome: The dispatcher receives the work request.

tasks.description: The dispatcher checks the train schedule to ensure no trains are scheduled to run through that segment during the requested time.
tasks.expected_outcome: The dispatcher confirms the track will be clear.

tasks.description: The dispatcher grants the maintenance window, placing a block on the track segment in the control system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The track is marked as out-of-service for the specified time.

tasks.description: When the work is complete, the foreman reports the track is clear, and the dispatcher removes the block, returning the track to service.
tasks.expected_outcome: The track is safely returned to service after maintenance.
